definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across

sentences.english: Returns a string describing the specified status code or error code.
sentences.chinese: 返回一個字串來描述特定的狀態信息或錯誤代碼。

sentences.english: The expect and reply strings may contain escape sequences.
sentences.chinese: 期待以及回覆字串可以包含轉義序列。

sentences.english: Specifies the unique numeric string that identifies the server session.
sentences.chinese: 指定唯一的數字串來識別服務器會話。

sentences.english: Writes a subarray of characters to the text stream.
sentences.chinese: 將字串寫入文字資料流。

sentences.english: The control displays and sets a text string from a list of choices.
sentences.chinese: 這個控制項會顯示和設定選擇清單中的文字字串。

sentences.english: The key strokes to split inputted string.
sentences.chinese: 用來對所輸入字串斷句的按鍵。

sentences.english: As an example, consider a regular expression that changes all words to uppercase in a given string.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我們想將某字串中的字母全部轉變成大寫。

sentences.english: Returns a string representing the path to the known local user configuration file.
sentences.chinese: 傳回字串，表示已知本機使用者組態檔的路徑。

sentences.english: The string returns everything listed after the program name on the command line.
sentences.chinese: 字串會傳回命令列上程式名稱後列出的一切。

sentences.english: These two statements match a 1-bit long string.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個語句匹配1bit長字串。

sentences.english: A string is a block of text.
If set to an empty string the link will not appear.
sentences.chinese: 如果設定爲空字串則不會顯示連結。

sentences.english: Configure display format strings for date and time.
sentences.chinese: 設定日期與時間的顯示格式字串。

sentences.english: Strings can be explicitly cast to a different string type (see Typecasts ).
sentences.chinese: 字符串可以被明確的擲爲不同的字串類型。

sentences.english: String concatenation is the primary point of entry for script injection.
sentences.chinese: 字串串連是指令碼攻擊的主要進入點。

sentences.english: Returns the file name of the specified path string without the extension.
sentences.chinese: 傳回沒有副檔名的指定路徑字串的檔案名稱。

definition: character set (e.g. ASCII 美國資訊交換標準碼|美国资讯交换标准码 or Unicode 統一碼|统一码)
